Features ClassÂ¶

match_len(dataset) interpolate to the maximum sized data in the reference set
center(ref_data) subtract the mean of each feature from itself
shared(D1[, D2]) get data with only features shared amongst all sets
gen_weights(dataset) Create weight table from reference data
meaningful(weights[, limit, top, include_keys]) get a weight table of the most meaningful features
